item.title: Moment 141. The Truth About “Honest” Feedback
item.description:
Learn why your boss might not be telling you the truth, and how to spot real feedback.


Feedback is a gift… but, can you believe what you’re told?


It’s rare to find a leader who gives consistent, high-quality feedback. It’s even rarer to find a company where feedback is part and parcel of the culture.


This is why it’s so important to know how to read the play – the context is all-important... Feed: https://feeds.acast.com/public/shows/2fec86c4-2f6a-5de0-abd4-1301a5d509fc

item.title: Solange Peters, MD, PhD - Pioneering Precision: A Real-World Roadmap to Optimal Outcomes in NTRK Fusion-Positive and HER2-Mutant Advanced NSCLC
